name: CyberPong (itch) (YaikaRace)
description:
CyberPong

CyberPong is an open source game made in Godot Engine 3, based on pong and adding a lot of neon effects with extra additions to make the game more fun!

Keys:Player 1:
  • W = Up
  • S = Down
  • Space = Throw the ball / Power Up
Player 2:
  • Up arrow = Up
  • Down arrow = Down
  • Numpad 0 = Throw the ball / Power Up
Features:
  • Classic Pong
  • Modifiers
  • Power Ups
  • Obstacle
  • Soccer mode
  • Basketball mode
  • Retro Style
  • Ball and Player customization
Source Code:

All the source code is hosted on github, if you want to contribute you can follow the instructions on the page

https://github.com/YaikaRace/cyberpong
